title: The Miracle
lyrics:
[Intro: Freddie Mercury]
[Verse 1: Freddie Mercury]
Every drop of rain that falls in Sahara Desert says it all
It's a miracle
All God's creations great and small
The Golden Gate and the Taj Mahal, that's a miracle
Test tube babies bein' born
Mothers, fathers dead and gone
It's a miracle
[Chorus: Freddie Mercury]
We're having a miracle on earth
Mother Nature does it all for us
The wonders of this world go on
The hangin' Gardens of Babylon
Captain Cook and Cain and Abel
Jimi Hendrix to the Tower of Babel
It's a miracle, it's a miracle
It's a miracle, it's a miracle
[Bridge: Freddie Mercury]
The one thing we're all waitin' for
Is peace on earth
An end to war
It's a miracle we need
The miracle
The miracle we're all waitin' for today

[Instrumental Break]
[Verse 2: Freddie Mercury]
If every leaf on every tree
Could tell a story that would be
A miracle
If every child on every street
Had clothes to wear and food to eat
That's a miracle
If all God's people could be free
To live in perfect harmony, it's a miracle
[Chorus: Freddie Mercury & 
Freddie Mercury, Brian May & Roger Taylor
]
We're havin' a miracle on earth
Mother Nature does it all for us
(
The wonders of this world go on
)
Open hearts and surgery
Sunday mornings with a cup of tea
Superpowers always fightin'
Mona Lisa just keeps on smilin'
It's a miracle, it's a miracle
It's a miracle
[Instrumental Break: Freddie Mercury, Brian May & Roger Taylor & 
Freddie Mercury]
(
The wonders of this world go on
)
It's a miracle, it's a miracle
It's a miracle, it's a miracle

[Bridge: Freddie Mercury]
The one thing (The one thing)
We're all waiting for (We're all waiting for)
Is peace on earth (Peace on earth)
And an end to war (End to war)
It's a miracle we need
The miracle
The miracle!
Peace on earth and end to war, today
[Guitar Solo]
[Outro: Freddie Mercury]
That time will come, one day you'll see
When we can all be friends
That time will come, one day you'll see
When we can all be friends
That time will come, one day you'll see
When we can all be friends
That time will come, one day you'll see
When we can all be friends
